descriptionHtml:
A japan-style house for player. My first mod.

Location : Near Talking stone camp ; north-east from Rorikburg.

Required mods : none.

Issues :

If mannequins in the armory room are invisible, or if they have \"ghost duplicates\", activate them and give them an object like ring or amulet. If they move or show a strange pose, quit the place and come back.

I was not able to manage navmeshes correctly, therefore your companions will not follow you into some parts of the house.

Please notice me if you have other bugs (invisible building etc), crashes... 

Feel free to use and change any parts of my mod. You have not to obtain my allowance.
author: Leucippe
